Scn fbmwBMLycanthropycureScript

Begin OnEquip
	if(GetStage fbmwBMLycanthropycure == 10)
		set fbmwBMAAAImAWere.isday to 1
		set fbmwBMAAAImAWere.iswerewolf to 0
		set fbmwBMAAAImAWere.haskilledaswere to 0
		set fbmwBMAAAImAWere.DoOncebloodlust to 0
		set fbmwBMWereStart.infectday to 0
		StopQuest fbmwBMAAAImAWere
		StopQuest fbmwBMWereStart
		SetStage fbmwBMLycanthropycure 20
	endif
end
